projects.description: Displays a random quote from a curated selection, with a changing background color to accompany it. Quotes and colors change automatically, but the viewer can also click to show other quotes.
This project paginates a given list of students and creates links which dynamically display a set of students.
This project utilizes jQuery to add dynamic functionality to a form, validates form fields, prevents the form from submitting if any fields are invalid, and visually indicates errors to the user.

A game that responds to user interaction and reveals letters in a hidden phrase. The user can type on their keyboard or click keys on an onscreen keyboard. The winning/losing screen allows the player to restart the game, where the game is reset and a new hidden phrase is populated to the screen.

This project creates a mock employee directory with data fetched from a public API. It displays employee information dynamically, as well as displaying additional information when an employee is clicked.
